About FreeToolkit Calculator

FreeToolkit Calculator provides free, fast, and accurate online calculators for everyday use. Whether you need to split a restaurant bill, calculate your BMI, figure out a loan payment, or convert units, we've got you covered.

Our Mission

We believe essential calculation tools should be free, fast, and accessible to everyone. No sign-ups, no downloads, no ads blocking your results. Just type your numbers and get instant, accurate answers.

How Our Calculators Work

All calculations happen directly in your browser using JavaScript. Your data never leaves your device ‚Äî we don't store, track, or transmit any numbers you enter. This means our tools work even when you're offline (after the initial page load).

Accuracy

Our calculators use industry-standard formulas and methods. The BMI calculator follows WHO guidelines. The compound interest calculator uses the standard compounding formula. The calorie calculator uses the Mifflin-St Jeor equation, widely regarded as the most accurate predictive equation for estimating resting metabolic rate.

While we strive for accuracy, please note that calculators provide estimates and should not replace professional advice. Always consult qualified professionals for financial, medical, or legal decisions.

Categories

Our calculator collection spans six categories:

  • Everyday Math ‚Äî percentage, tip, discount, average, and random number generators
  • Finance ‚Äî compound interest, loan payments, salary conversion, and price comparison
  • Time & Date ‚Äî age calculator, date difference, and time zone converter
  • Health ‚Äî BMI, calorie needs, and body fat estimation
  • Academic ‚Äî GPA and final grade calculators
  • Conversion ‚Äî temperature, length, and weight unit converters

Contact

Have a suggestion for a new calculator? Found a bug? We'd love to hear from you. Visit our contact page to get in touch.
